wikipedia_page.main: Michael Glyn Fowler (born 20 November 1951) is a British Circuit judge.He was educated at King's College London (LLB, 1973). He was called to the bar at Middle Temple in 1974 and served as a Recorder from 2000 to 2009.

response: Wellington's principal concert performance hall, the Michael Fowler Centre, opened in 1983, was named in his honour.Michael Fowler Centre history. Retrieved 25 May 2013.
*Cartoon of Frank Kitts & Michael Fowler in 1974
